product_name: Aqua Sphere Zip VX Fitness Swim Fins
long_description: The Aqua Sphere Zip VX Fitness Swim Fins boost your swimming efficiency by helping ensure proper body position and increasing thrust for improved cardiovascular conditioning and ankle flexibility. Fins leverage your natural kicking motion to produce a springboard effect that boosts efficiency. Holes in the blades create vortices that increase thrust. Narrow blades improve kicking mechanics and reduce fatigue. Easy-to-adjust buckles create a custom fit. Non-slip pads on the fin rails provide traction for a better push off the pool wall. The Aqua Sphere Zip VX Fitness Swim Fins are perfect for all swimming levels.
short_description: The Aqua Sphere Zip VX Fitness Swim Fins boost your swimming efficiency by helping ensure proper body position and increasing thrust for improved cardiovascular conditioning and ankle flexibility.
